sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Once in court, he pleaded not guilty to 34 felony charges,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: stemming from a hush money payment made during the 2016 presidential campaign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Never before in the history of the United States has a former president faced criminal charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Driving to the courthouse from his apartment in Trump Tower, the 2024 presidential candidate narrated the events on social media, calling the experience surreal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The hearing itself lasted just a few minutes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The charges relate to a payment to adult film star Stormy Daniels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Prosecutors say the payoff was part of conspiracy to undermine the integrity of the 2016 election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Trump then left the building heading for his Mar-a-Lago home in Florida where he is scheduled to speak to supporters later on Tuesday. In New York security was on high alert for fears of rioters outside the court. Pro and anti-Trump groups exchanged insults in front of a heavy police presence. Trump claims to be in front of a heavy police presence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Trump claims to be a victim of a witch hunt orchestrated by the Democrats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Beyond this case, the former president is subject of several other investigations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In particular, on his role to the Capitol riot on January 6th, 2021, his handling of presidential files and allegations he pressured election officials in Georgia to falsify the vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: This is an historic day. We welcome Finland as a new member of our alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Finland has officially become the 31st member of NATO dabbling the military alliance's border with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: At a ceremony in the headquarters of the alliance in Brussels, the blue and white flag of Finland was raised alongside those of its partners after almost 11 months in the waiting room.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: What happens from today on is that Finland will be covered by NATO's ironclad security guarantees, our Article 5 that says that an attack on one ally will be regarded as an attack on all, one for all, all for one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Turkey became the last NATO member to ratify Finland's bid last week, but they still blocked Sweden's application, accusing the Swedes of giving refuge to Kurdish militants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Hungarian parliament also remains to ratify the Swedish bid, accusing Stockholm of strongly criticizing Budapest over rule of law and democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Finnish president appeared optimistic for Swedish accession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We have all the way been working together with Sweden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We continue helping them as much as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I have been discussing with the president Erdogan, you have been discussing many times, and I think at least I have a very positive outlook for that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: No breakthrough for Sweden is expected before Turkish elections in May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: NATO's goal is to have full membership for the country at NATO's summit in Vilnius July 2023.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Russia has warned it might be forced to take retaliatory measures to address what it calls security threats created by Finland's membership of NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The statement from the foreign ministry came after Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov said Russia's response would match any buildup on its borders. Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu said that Finland's accession to NATO increased the risk of conflict, but would not distract Moscow from its action in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Shoigu also said that Russia had transferred Iskander rocket systems to Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They can be used to carry conventional or nuclear missiles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And a storage facility for tactical nuclear weapons in Belarus is set to be completed by July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The government announced on Tuesday that over the next seven years it will devote $413 billion to defense.

sentences.sentence: The annual budget will more than double, rising from $32 billion in 2017 to $69 billion in 2030.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But undoubtedly, the great military revolution is that of Germany, which, in the heat of the Russian invasion of Ukraine, announced a $100 billion increase to its 2022 military budget in order to modernize its armed forces.

sentences.sentence: Dramatic increases in their defense spending have also been announced by the Baltic countries, Italy, the United Kingdom and Sweden, which is waiting to join NATO after decades of neutrality.
